termsOfUseText: All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. Everyone has the right to life, liberty and security of person. No one shall be subjected to torture or to cruel, inhuman or degrading treatment or punishment. Everyone has the right to recognition everywhere as a person before the law.
featureUnavailable: This feature is not available at the moment.
messageOffline: Please access this page, at least once, with Internet enable.
